ARABIC: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who reject their Lord will have the punishment of Hell. What an evil destination!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For those who believe not in their Lord there is the punishment of Hell; and what a wretched destination
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The chastisement of Hell awaits those who disbelieve in their Lord. What a wretched destination!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: For those who have disbelieved in their Lord, We have prepared the torment of hell, the most terrible place to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord, is the punishment of hell; and what a wretched outcome!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord is the torment of Hell, and worst indeed is that destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord is the punishment of hell, and evil is the resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there awaits the chastisement of Gehenna -- an evil homecoming!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there is the doom of hell, a hapless journey's end!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who are bent on blaspheming against their Lord will have the punishment of Hell: an evil destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord will be the torment of Hell; and a hapless destination!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: For those who defy their Lord is the punishment of hell, and it is an evil destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For those who reject their Lord (and Cherisher) is the Penalty of Hell: and evil is (such), Destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord (Allah) is the torment of Hell, and worst indeed is that destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there awaits the punishment of Gehenna (Hell) an evil arrival!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For those who reject their Lord, there is the torment of Hell. What an evil destination!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [67:6] And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there is the chastisement of Hell, and [what] an evil journey’s end!, it is.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And for those who disbelieve in their Lord there is the doom of hell, a hapless journey's end) they shall come to in Gehenna!
